data.description:
A playground classic, reinvented.
Play Tetherball in mindblowing worlds!

EXPLORE energetic or relaxing worlds that flourish as you play
CONNECT with friends and family with voice chat
CHALLENGE yourself in solo rally or competitive 2-player*

We are Kinetic Art Labs, a Mixed Reality game studio creating social and fun experiences for all ages. Our launch title TetherballVR gives people a throwback to the classic game, hitting a tethered ball around a pole with hands or bats, whilst exploring fantastic worlds - built in collab with artists: S. Fan, Colormotor, Metaxu Studio, A. Zelinskie; and musicians, B. Dixon and DJ J. Boy.

Single Player Rally: Hit the ball in solo mode and dynamically build up the world around you as you maximise your rally count against the clock! Play 3, 5 or 10 minutes games and hit combos to unlock hidden animations.

Two Player Mode*: Express your competitive edge as you face off (and chat) with an opponent to wrap the ball around the pole with 6, 9 or 12 rotations targets.

* This is our Open Beta release - depending on internet connection and our server you may currently experience some lag in online 2-player version - thank you for your patience, we are working on this!

Combos are defined by the number of shots in a row without misses. Each combo triggers a rewarding animation that will last until the player misses. Three hits Right or Left hand, or alternate hand 6 shots.

Immerse yourself in TetherballVR and find your flow.

changelog.change_log: This Alpha release is locked. We've been using it to make sure it would pass Meta review. If you'd like to try the game, please contact us via our website, we'd be delighted to add you as early alpha testers.
Coloured Spiral with XR player on
